candles.name: Vanilla Dream
candles.description: A luxurious vanilla-scented candle that fills your room with warmth and comfort. Perfect for creating a cozy atmosphere during evening relaxation.

candles.name: Ocean Breeze
candles.description: Fresh ocean-inspired scent that brings the calming essence of sea air into your home. Ideal for meditation and stress relief.

candles.name: Lavender Fields
candles.description: Pure lavender essential oil creates a soothing ambiance perfect for bedtime routines and peaceful sleep.

candles.name: Cinnamon Spice
candles.description: Warm cinnamon and spice blend that evokes memories of holiday gatherings and freshly baked treats.

candles.name: Eucalyptus Mint
candles.description: Refreshing eucalyptus and mint combination that energizes and clears the mind. Perfect for home offices and study spaces.

candles.name: Rose Garden
candles.description: Elegant rose petals create a romantic and sophisticated atmosphere. Handcrafted with premium rose essential oils.

candles.name: Pine Forest
candles.description: Fresh pine needles and forest floor scents bring the outdoors inside. Perfect for nature lovers and cabin vibes.

candles.name: Citrus Burst
candles.description: Vibrant blend of orange, lemon, and grapefruit that instantly uplifts mood and energizes any space.

candles.name: Sandalwood Serenity
candles.description: Rich sandalwood creates a grounding and meditative atmosphere. Ideal for yoga practice and spiritual moments.

candles.name: Jasmine Night
candles.description: Exotic jasmine flowers bloom in the evening air. This sophisticated scent is perfect for intimate dinner parties.

candles.name: Coffee House
candles.description: Rich coffee bean aroma mixed with hints of chocolate and cream. Perfect for coffee lovers and cozy mornings.

candles.name: Apple Orchard
candles.description: Crisp apple scent with hints of autumn leaves and fresh air. Brings the essence of fall harvest season indoors.

candles.name: Bamboo Zen
candles.description: Clean bamboo and green tea create a minimalist, zen-like atmosphere. Perfect for modern spaces and mindful living.

candles.name: Chocolate Truffle
candles.description: Decadent chocolate scent that satisfies sweet cravings without the calories. Rich and indulgent for dessert lovers.

candles.name: Peppermint Frost
candles.description: Cool peppermint with icy undertones creates a refreshing winter wonderland atmosphere. Invigorating and crisp.
